entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then clearing. Blowing snow overnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h early this evening then west 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 18 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. Temperature steady near minus 29.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 29. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill minus 42 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
